content:
Prodam notesnik, kupljen pred 1 mesecem v ZDA
Znamke Gateway, model M-1615
Naloženi licenčni Vista Home premium
kontakt preko zs ali miran77@gmail.com

Specifikacije :
http://www.gateway.com/retail/m1615.php

Procesor
AMD Turion™ 64 X2 dvojedrni Mobile Technology TL-56
1.8GHz | 512KB x 2 L2 Cache | Hypertransport™

Display
15.4" Widescreen Ultrabright™ WXGA TFT (1280x800)

Memory
2048MB DDR2 Memory, Dual Channel (2 x 1024MB), 667MHz 2 DDR2 Slots

Video
ATI Radeon® Xpress 1270M

Hard Drive
250GB 5400RPM SATA

Optical Drive
8x Multi-Format Dual Layer DVD+/-RW with DVD-RAM

Digital Media Reader
5-in-1 Memory Card Reader
Secure Digital™ (SD), Multi Media Card™ (MMC), Memory Stick™ (MS), Memory Stick™ Pro, XD

1.3 Mpix WEbcam

Communications
56k ITU v.92 ready Fax/Modem (RJ-11 port)
10/100 Mbps Ethernet LAN (RJ-45 port)
802.11g Wireless LAN, Bluetooth® 2.0 + EDR

Interfaces
3 - USB 2.0 ports
1 - VGA connector
1 - RJ-45 ethernet port
1 - RJ-11 modem port
1 - Headphone / audio out
1 - Microphone
1 - Kensington lock slot
1 - AC adapter connector
1 - HDMI port
author: Odyssey
